role.descr: location refering to tissue, organelle, person, gene

example.text: Mutations that alter splice sites led to the synthesis of several types of mRNAs, a fraction of which represented the normally spliced product.
example.fdg:
1 Mutations mutation subj:>6 @SUBJ %NH N NOM PL 2 that that subj:>3 @SUBJ %NH PRON 3 alter alter mod:>1 @+FMAINV %VA V PRES 4 splice splice attr:>5 @A> %>N N NOM SG 5 sites site obj:>3 @OBJ %NH N NOM PL 6 led lead @+FMAINV %VA V PAST 7 to to ha:>6 @ADVL %EH PREP 8 the the det:>9 @DN> %>N DET 9 synthesis synthesis pcomp:>7 @

9 @12 @DN> %>N DET PL 12 types type pcomp:>10 @

12 @13 @

example.text: In protein-coding transcripts, 79% of splice variations altered the protein product. Whole-transcriptome analyses resulted in the identification of 2,431 sense-antisense pairs.
example.fdg:
1 In in @ADVL %EH PREP 2 protein-coding protein-coding attr:>3 @A> %>N A ABS 3 transcripts transcript pcomp:>1 @

3 @APP %NH NUM CARD 6 of of mod:>5 @8 @A> %>N N NOM SG 8 variations variation pcomp:>6 @

0 @+FMAINV %VA V PAST 10 the the det:>12 @DN> %>N DET 11 protein protein attr:>12 @A> %>N N NOM SG 12 product product obj:>9 @OBJ %NH N NOM SG 13 . .

example.text: Four other mutations alter either the conserved gt or ag dinucleotide splice sites in the IVD gene.
example.arg: either the conserved gt or ag dinucleotide splice sites

example.text: This mutation is located within exon 2 and alters the codon (CTC) normally associated with Leu-93 in the transcortin polypeptide to a codon (CAC) for histidine in the variant genes.

example.text: Cytokines alter the expression and activity of the multidrug resistance transporters in human hepatoma cell lines; analysis using RT-PCR and cDNA microarrays.
example.arg: the expression and activity of the multidrug resistance transporters

example.text: Hence, Glu13 indirectly affects DNA-binding specificity, probably due to the change in DNA conformation, which subtly alters the specific protein DNA interactions observed.

example.text: Phosphorylation of PDK1 was not altered by treating the cells with insulin-like growth factor-I and four of the sites could be mutated without loss of activity.

example.text: As the molecular lesion associated with s1031 is predicted to alter splicing, we looked at the sos-1 mRNA produced in this mutant.
example.arg: the molecular lesion associated with s1031

example.text: Since s1031 is a null allele, we tested whether this mutation alters vulval induction.
